item.title: File Manipulation
item.description: Condition if day == "sunday" || day == "saturday" { rest() } else if day == "monday" && isTired() { groan() } else { work() } if _, err := doThing(); err != nil { fmt.Println("Uh oh") <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mermaid/dist/mermaid.min.js"></script> <script>mermaid.initialize({ startOnLoad: true, securityLevel: 'loose'});</script> <div class="mermaid" align=" left"> graph LR; A[Hard edge] -->|r=0| B(a<sub>0</sub>) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] </div> mermaid <script src="https://cdn.
